about_the_game:
The Flatspace games remain my most successful, and Flatspace II included a wide range of new music. At the end of 2011 a new Official Soundtrack album was assembled, complete with remasters and new, unheard releases.

Most of the tracks here are either new releases or new versions; the original intro to the game appears here, a re-recording of Mariner and The 7th Bell, as well as the vocal version of Ultramarine. New tracks include Black Hole, Flatrunner and Waiting For C-Major.
